channel.title: 317 pls help!

item.title: 317 pls help!
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

[quote=“crimsonbow13, post:2, topic:325112”]You don’t have the emote code…
Try this one:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "OMFG I am worshiping "+playerName+", I thought i would never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

(But change the public “hail” to your command)
Also, I don’t know if this will work or not.[/quote]

Thats not gonna work if you use a average 317 source.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pls help!
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

You don’t have the emote code…
Try this one:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "OMFG I am worshiping "+playerName+", I thought i would never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

(But change the public “hail” to your command)
Also, I don’t know if this will work or not.

item.title: 317 pls help!
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

Why Dosen’t This Command Work?

if(command.equals("bowtomaster") && playerRights >= 3) {
   for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
      if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
         client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client

         {
         PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Lol Nubs What U's Doing?!";
              string4UpdateRequired = true;
         {
         castOn.setAnimation(858);
         castOn.txt4="We Love You The Friend And Friendly Our Masters!";
         castOn.string4UpdateRequired = true; }
}

It Dosent Do Anything
Just Sends Message To All Saying "Lol Nubs What U’S Doing?!
Pls Fix This For Me, Post Your Command In So I Can Copy/Paste Thx

Read full topic
